ComicInfo.Summary:
Wembley: Savage and his gang strike back at the execution of innocent victims by staging a firing squad of their own.
Flesh Book 1 Part 6: As the town burns, Carver, One Eye, and Reagan have a final showdown.
Harlem Heroes Part 6: The Harlem Heroes travel to Russia for their match against the Siberian Wolves who, per the American commenter, "all look the same to me, folks, so I'll have to go by numbers... I'll call them all Boris!"
Dan Dare Part 6: The history of the Biogs and Shepherds is told, though Dan and Monday balk at the idea of becoming Biog fuel.
Himmler's Gold: M.A.C.H. 1, who always eats his "sunshine breakfast", stops Colonel Kreuzer's Nazi plan to retrieve sunken gold.
Frankenstein II: Judge Dredd busts up an illegal Transplant Surgery operation.
